newsitem.title: FRANCE: Ecia buys 50 pct stake in Argentine firm.
newsitem.headline: Ecia buys 50 pct stake in Argentine firm.

text.p: Components maker Ecia, controlled by French carmaker PSA Peugeot Citroen, said on Monday it had bought 50 percent of Tekno Emision SA, the exhaust systems unit of Argentine parts supplier Roberto Baccanelli.
Ecia expects to eventually increase that stake to 70 percent, as Roberto Baccanelli has agreed to lower its holding to 30 percent.
"This new subsidiary, which will take the name Ecia RB Argentina SA, confirms Ecia's interest to develop its activities in the Mercosur trade bloc," Ecia said in a statement.
